Projects.title: Total Titans
Projects.description: A workout application for gym rats of all shapes, sizes, and levels of experience! View previously made workouts, or create your own.

Projects.title: CLHA Web App
Projects.description: Client project for the Cedar Lake Historical Association. A web application for users to view historical sites in the Cedar Lake area.

Projects.title: Natours
Projects.description: Travel across the globe, touring the most beautiful places that nature has to offer.

Projects.title: Dinner Dart
Projects.description: My Senior Capstone project. A Firebase web app that's basically a Door Dash clone. Features CRUD operations, user authentication, and a Firestore backend, as well as different user roles.

Projects.title: Trillo
Projects.description: Want to get away with some friends or family on a holiday?

Projects.title: Fight Life
Projects.description: React single page application with Firebase authentication and firestore data/file storage. Checkout upcoming boxing fights, and connect with world champions.

Projects.title: SV Marriage Cards
Projects.description: Fans of Stardew Valley, this ones for you! Checkout all the candidates in the game available for marriage, and learn more about them.

Projects.title: Developer Match
Projects.description: A fun little matching game with CSS animations, built with React JavaScript. Themed with some of my favorite programming languages!

Projects.title: Travel-Fly
Projects.description: The final project for my Intermediate Web Dev summer course of 2019. For those with a strong desire or impulse to wander, or travel the world.

Projects.title: My Money
Projects.description: Finance tracking application with user authentication and Firebase backend. Start tracking your purchases today! Definitely the most secure banking application ever.
